gym_mizu_040_receptionist_01:
Are you ready to challenge Gym Leader Kofu,
the Surging Chef?
gym_mizu_040_receptionist_02:
Very well. Allow me to show you to the
battle court.
gym_mizu_040_receptionist_03:
Of course. Please feel free to come speak to me
whenever you’re ready.
gym_mizu_040_boy_entry_01: Old man Kofu! Play with us! C’mon!
gym_mizu_040_woman_entry_01:
I would be honored if you would try a new item
from my restaurant’s menu as well.
gym_mizu_040_mizu_entry_01:
Sorry, everybody! I’ve got some business to take
care of as Gym Leader real quick-like![npcn:18]
gym_mizu_040_mizu_entry_02:
I’m keepin’ someone waitin’, ya see. Please
forgive me. I need to do this first![npcn:18]
gym_mizu_040_mizu_01: Heya, step right up! I’ve been waitin’ for ya.[npcn:18]
gym_mizu_040_mizu_02:
Thanks for the help over in Porto Marinada!
You did a mighty fine job![npcn:18]
gym_mizu_040_mizu_03:
And now that I’ve got that legendary seaweed,
I kin make some real quality dishes with it![npcn:18]
gym_mizu_040_mizu_04:
But don’ expect me to go easy on ya in our
battle here![npcn:18]
gym_mizu_040_mizu_06:
At the auction, we battle with buyin’ and sellin’.
At my Gym, we battle in a more traditional sense![npcn:18]
gym_mizu_040_mizu_07:
Moves and tactics—ever-changin’ as the
raging sea![npcn:18]
gym_mizu_040_mizu_08:
I’mma serve you a full course o’ Water-type
Pokémon! Don’t try to eat ’em, though![npcn:18]
gym_mizu_040_mizu_09:
Gahaha! A loss as refreshing as the air at the
morning market![npcn:18]
gym_mizu_040_mizu_10:
I’m just like a helpless little Magikarp to you, eh?
Floppin’ around all willy-nilly![npcn:18]
gym_mizu_040_mizu_11:
You got me good, I tell ya! What a great catch
you are![npcn:18]
gym_mizu_040_mizu_12:
Just like a master fisher, ya held on tight till the
last second and reeled in victory![npcn:18]
gym_mizu_040_mizu_13:
Now it’s time to hand over a Gym Badge to ya!\c
And let’s get a REEL good photo together usin’ a
pose I’ve been wantin’ to try out for a while now![npcn:18]
gym_mizu_040_mizu_badge:
With [num1:1] Gym Badge[s:n1] in yer possession, Pokémon
of up to Lv. [num2:2] will be easier to catch and’ll listen\r
to ya when you ask ’em to do things![npcn:18]
gym_mizu_040_mizu_badge_all:
With 8 Gym Badges in yer possession, you kin
catch Pokémon of any level, and they’ll all listen\r
to ya when you ask ’em to do things, too![npcn:18]
gym_mizu_040_mizu_waza:
Lemme throw this in too as an extra-special
bonus! I’m sure you kin make good use of it![npcn:18]
gym_mizu_040_mizu_14:
All righty. It’s about time I headed on back to my
restaurant and got to preppin’ for the next wave![npcn:18]
gym_mizu_040_mizu_15: You come back to see me again now, ya hear?[npcn:18]
gym_mizu_040_receptionist_04:
Congratulations! You’re now certified by the
Cascarrafa Gym!
